mapper.select: select sellinfo.vending_id, count(sellinfo.drink_id) as 'sales' from sellinfo inner join drinks on sellinfo.drink_id = drinks.drink_id group by sellinfo.vending_id order by sales desc

select drinks.drink_id, drink_name, drink_category, count(sellinfo.drink_id) as 'sales' from drinks left join sellinfo on drinks.drink_id=sellinfo.drink_id where vending_id = #{vendingId} group by drink_id order by sales desc
select customer_age, customer_gender, count(*) as 'customer_count' from sellinfo where vending_id=#{vendingId} and drink_id=#{drinkId} group by customer_age,customer_gender
select drink_id from sellinfo where vending_id = #{vendingId} group by drink_id limit 3
